Uses of Class
arena.core.Action

  • Uses of Action in arena.core

    Methods in arena.core that return Action 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Action GameUtility.chooseRandomly​(Action... actions)
    Chooses randomly from the specified actions.
    Action GameUtility.moveTowards​(int destinationX, int destinationY)
    Returns an action that moves the player to the specified location; if there is no path, it will return NoAction.
    Action GameUtility.placeMineTowards​(int destinationX, int destinationY)
    Returns an action that places a mine towards the specified location.
    Action GameUtility.shootTowards​(int destinationX, int destinationY)
    Returns an action that shoots a projectile to the specified location.
    static Action Action.valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
    Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
    static Action[] Action.values()
    Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
    Methods in arena.core with parameters of type Action 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Action GameUtility.chooseRandomly​(Action... actions)
    Chooses randomly from the specified actions.
